Agent.Name: Trigonometry Agent
Agent.Description: Agent that can perform only trigonometric operations. It cannot perform any other mathematical operation whatsoever.

Skills.Name: Cos function
Skills.Description: Returns the Cosine of a number.

Skills.Name: Sine function
Skills.Description: Returns the sine of a number.

Skills.Name: Tan function
Skills.Description: Returns the tangent of a number.
